price: Kuma waɗanda suke ciyar da dũkiyõyinsu dõmin nũna wa mutãne, kuma bã su yin ĩmãni da Allah, kuma bã su yin ĩmãnida Rãnar Lãhira kuma wanda Shaiɗan ya kasance abõkin haɗi a gare shi, to, yã mũnana ga abõkinhaɗi.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمۡوَٰلَهُمۡ رِئَآءَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَلَا بِٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِۗ وَمَن يَكُنِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لَهُۥ قَرِينٗا فَسَآءَ قَرِينٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yunfiqūna amwālahum riāa al-nāsi walā yu'minūna bil-lahi walā bil-yawmi al-ākhiri waman yakuni al-shayṭānu lahu qarīnan fasāa qarīnan
